name: Lemon Prawn Risotto
description: Join our risotto revolution! Say goodbye to endless stirring and stovetop chaos because today, we're making a creamy and dreamy risotto right in the microwave. In just a few simple steps, you'll be wondering why you ever bothered with the stovetop.
preparation: Place seasoning, broth, rice, and butter in Round or Multipurpose Steamer; stir to combine. Cover; microwave on high 8 min.
Remove from microwave; stir in prawns. Cover; microwave on high for 8 min.
Remove from microwave; stir in peas. Cover; microwave on high 6 min.
Fold in sour cream. Top with Parmesan, if desired. Serve warm; risotto will continue to thicken as it cools.
tips: Enjoy risotto hot and fresh—the rice will continue to absorb liquid as it cools so it’s best to serve it immediately.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.
